name: Barbed Trap
description: Set a sharpened blade trap at your location, which takes 1.5 seconds to arm and lasts for 15 seconds  When triggered, the trap deals 1161 Bleed Damage, an additional 2778 Bleed Damage over 18 seconds, and grants you Minor Force, increasing your Critical Damage by 10% for the duration.   Enemies who activate the trap are immobilized for 2 seconds.
effectLines: Increases the duration of the damage over time and Minor Force.

Enemies who activate the trap are immobilized for 2 seconds.
